channel.title: Lets defend on MMOX
channel.description: Recent content in Lets defend on MMOX

item.title: Let's Defend - LockBit
item.description: Description: One of our men got attacked. can you investigate his computer? Q1: Using a memory dump analysis, can you determine the date and time that the device was infected with the malware? Q2: What is the name of the ransomware family responsible for the attack? Q3: What file extension is appended to the encrypted files by the ransomware? Q4: What is the TLSH (Trend Micro Locality Sensitive Hash) of the ransomware?
